data.phrase:
dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| comp count(low_sev_alerts) as Low, count(med_sev_alerts) as Medium, count(high_sev_alerts) as High, count(crit_sev_alerts) as Critical by _time
| sort asc _time


| view graph type = line xaxis = _time yaxis = Low,Medium,High,Critical seriescolor("Medium","#ffa600") seriescolor("High","#fc4444") seriescolor("Critical","#982403") seriestitle("Low","Low") seriestitle("Medium","Medium") seriestitle("High","High") seriestitle("Critical","Critical")

dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| comp count() by resolution_status


| view graph type = pie xaxis = resolution_status yaxis = count_1

dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| alter Reported_By = arrayindex(email_sender,0)
| comp count() as alert_count, count(low_sev_alerts) as Low, count(med_sev_alerts) as Medium, count(high_sev_alerts) as High, count(crit_sev_alerts) as Critical, count_distinct(alert_name) as distinct_alert_names by Reported_By 
| fields Reported_By, alert_count, distinct_alert_names, Low, Medium, High, Critical 
| sort desc alert_count

dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| comp count(low_sev_alerts) as Low, count(med_sev_alerts) as Medium, count(high_sev_alerts) as High, count(crit_sev_alerts) as Critical by _time
| sort asc _time


| view graph type = line xaxis = _time yaxis = Low,Medium,High,Critical seriescolor("Medium","#ffa600") seriescolor("High","#fc4444") seriescolor("Critical","#982403") seriestitle("Low","Low") seriestitle("Medium","Medium") seriestitle("High","High") seriestitle("Critical","Critical")

dataset = alerts
| bin _time span = 1d
| filter alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter str_status = if(resolution_status = ENUM.NEW, "NEW", if(resolution_status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION, "UNDER INVESTIGATION", "RESOLVED"))
| alter str_severity = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low", if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium", if(severity=ENUM.HIGH, "High", if(severity=ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical"))))
| alter low_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.LOW, "Low"), med_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.MEDIUM, "Medium"), high_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.HIGH, "High"), crit_sev_alerts = if(severity = ENUM.CRITICAL, "Critical")
| comp count() as Alerts by resolution_status

| view graph type = pie xaxis = resolution_status yaxis = Alerts
